name: Sport Camp
description: This Is a student sport Educational website.This website is a mobile-responsive platform with dark-light theme mode, role management, authentication and authorization using Firebase and JWT payment system by using stripe method, Student can easily login this site.Student can select their class and enroll by payment successfull .

name: Food Recipe
description: This website for information and chef food recipe and food item.User need to login before getting add a food or like.A user can place an order, and the user has a dashboard Where he can cancel the order.

name: Toy MarketPlace
description: This website for a Toy Management.Users need to login before getting add toy, quantity, add or delete.Client can update quantity (deliver or restock).
